MR No. 1405 - Excerpts From Diary, July 6-31, 1892; Strong Expressions of Faith in Spite of Physical Trials

     Preston, Melbourne, Australia, July 6, 1892. I am so thankful that I can tell the Lord all my fears and perplexities. I feel that I am under the shield of His wings. An infidel once asked a God-fearing youth, "How great is the God you worship?" "So great," was the reply, "that He fills immensity, and yet so small that He dwells in every sanctified heart."
